name: Mini Map (jam edition)
description:
Mini Map is a minimalistic puzzle game about leading a distractible (and rather stupid) hero though a treacherous dungeon. 

The hero will follow your commands, as long as he doesn’t become distracted by tempting treasure. Can you lead the hero safely through the dungeon? Good luck!

This game was made for GMTK jam 2020 and placed 49th. A full version is in development HERE

Music link: https://opengameart.org/content/wind-jam
